public static void sendEmail(java.lang.String smtpHost,

                             java.lang.String senderName,
                             java.lang.String receiverAddress,
                             java.lang.String sub,

                      throws CatalogException
Send email to a single recipient.

Parameters:
smtpHost - the SMTP email server address
senderAddress - the sender email address
senderName - the sender name
receiverAddress - the recipient email address
sub - the subject of the email
msg - the message content of the email
Throws:
CatalogException

sendEmail

public static void sendEmail(java.lang.String smtpHost,
                             java.lang.String senderAddress,
                             java.lang.String senderName,
                             java.util.List recipients,
                             java.lang.String sub,
                             java.lang.String msg)
                      throws CatalogException
Send email to a list of recipients.

Parameters:
smtpHost - the SMTP email server address
senderAddress - the sender email address
senderName - the sender name
recipients - a list of receipients email addresses
sub - the subject of the email
msg - the message content of the email
Throws:
CatalogException
